description_en: Shenzhen Outdoor Special Display Equipment Co., Ltd. is a specialized provider focused on the design, manufacturing, and integration of outdoor special display equipment. Based in Guangming New District, Shenzhen, the company operates a 3,000-square-meter modern factory with over 50 employees. It is equipped with advanced machinery including large laser cutters, high-precision CNC punching machines, CNC bending machines, digital hydraulic shears, CNC milling machines, and spray testing facilities, enabling complete in-house production from sheet metal processing to final assembly. The company's core offerings encompass commercial display equipment, outdoor high-brightness display sheet metal, customized advertising kiosks, and splicing monitor kits. It provides a comprehensive one-stop service covering design and R&D, OEM manufacturing, painting, and full integration of outdoor high-brightness display systems. With dedicated teams for sheet metal engineering, display integration, thermal management, waterproofing, and safety design, the company serves as a reliable long-term partner in the digital signage industry.

offerings.name: TFT Display
offerings.description: Size: 15", Resolution: 1980x740, Touch: Capacitive/Resistive, Brightness: 1000 nits
